pr_title: Fix download license archive (Admin > Import & Export)

timeline.message:
Fix: 'Download license archive' button in Admin>'import & Export' page is not working #906

Signed-off-by: Nguyen Phuong Nam <nam1.nguyenphuong@toshiba.co.jp>

Fix: 'Download license archive' button in Admin>'import & Export' page is not working #906

Signed-off-by: Nguyen Phuong Nam <nam1.nguyenphuong@toshiba.co.jp>

timeline.bodyText: As the same method is already present in LicenseAdminPortlet. May be we should consider to move it to a common place like Sw360Portlet
timeline.author: smrutis1
